document: {"blocks":[{"key":"8a3ah","text":"1. Astrocyte-neuron co-cultures on glass coverslips were fixed on DIV 12 with warm 4% PFA for 7 minutes, washed 3 times with PBS, blocked in a blocking buffer containing 50% normal goat serum (NGS) and 0.4% Triton X-100 for 30 minutes, and washed in PBS. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ff9ce","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9kb8d","text":"2. Samples were then incubated overnight at 4°C in primary antibodies diluted in blocking buffer containing 10% NGS, washed with PBS, incubated in Alexa Fluor conjugated secondary antibodies (Life Technologies) for 2 hours at room temperature, and washed again in PBS. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"81s7o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4h6k4","text":"3. Coverslips were mounted onto glass slides (VWR Scientific) with Vectashield mounting media containing DAPI (Vector Labs), sealed with nail polish, and imaged on an AxioImager M1 (Zeiss) fluorescence microscope. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9lko6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c4gev","text":"4. Images of healthy astrocytes with strong expression of fluorescent markers that did not overlap with other fluorescent astrocytes were acquired at 40× magnification in red, green, and/or DAPI channels using a CCD camera. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2dr17","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9f4d4","text":"5. Astrocyte morphological complexity was analyzed in FIJI using the Sholl analysis plugin, as described previously(https://github.com/Eroglu-Lab/In-Vitro-Sholl). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":116,"length":44}],"data":{}},{"key":"7fo9e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5k02j","text":"6. Statistical analyses were conducted using a custom code in R (https://github.com/Eroglu-Lab/In-Vitro-Sholl). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":65,"length":44}],"data":{}},{"key":"2kj2f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"78fpg","text":"7. A mixed-effect model with multiple comparisons made using the Tukey post-test was used for Sholl analysis to account for the variability per experiment as a random effect to evaluate differences between the conditions. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"317k3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d4cmo","text":"8. The exact number of independent experiments and the exact number of cells analyzed are indicated in the figure legend for each experiment. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d8sa4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"35ges","text":"9. To ensure the health of astrocyte-neuron co-cultures, the peak for the number of astrocyte intersections must be greater than or equal to 25 in the control condition. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"21f8n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ekjj8","text":"10. We imaged non-overlapping astrocytes that contained a single nucleus (DAPI stain) and expressed consistent fluorescent markers and EZRIN constructs according to the experimental conditions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"06CEC20EF98711ED98410A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://github.com/Eroglu-Lab/In-Vitro-Sholl"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"06CEC23FF98711ED98410A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://github.com/Eroglu-Lab/In-Vitro-Sholl"}}}}
